actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 167 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a special allowance for depreciation with respect to certain byproduct and waste energy conversion facilities.

summary.text: Provides a special formula for computing the depreciation deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for byproduct and waste energy conversion facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 167 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a special allowance for depreciation with respect to certain byproduct and waste energy conversion facilities.
